import sys

for __ in range(input()) :
    n , pie , rack = input() , map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()) , map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
    pie.sort()
    rack.sort()
    pidx , ridx , ans = 0 , 0 , 0
    while pidx < n and ridx < n :
        if pie[pidx] <= rack[ridx] :
            ans += 1
            pidx , ridx = pidx+1 , ridx+1
        else :
            ridx += 1
    print ans
